entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 86,401Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 164

Summary: Damian had been sexually assaulted and after that his father saw the video, he just want to run away. That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. And something is up with Tim but he doesn't know what. Jason is waiting for Dick to give him a proper answer. His hate for Bruce is too strong and he do not feel welcome in their perfect little family. or Everyone is dealing with things and their family is slowly falling appart. Would they succeed to all get along and get over the mistakes of the past?

entry.title: I Wanna Be Your Provider
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,076Chapters: 5/8Kudos: 79

Summary: Dick and Slade have been together for years, Slade being Dick's daddy so he could brat it up to his hearts content, blowing off steam from the pressure of being the whole damn Justice League's golden boy. Not long after Jason returns and he's got more than enough of his own shit to work through, Dick decides he needs a daddy too, and he tells Slade he's pretty sure he's supposed to be Jason's daddy like Slade was for him. Dick thinks that what Jason needs is to learn, like he did, that it can feel good to have someone put you in your place. Slade doesn't necessarily agree with either of these trains of thought, but sometimes with Dick the only way out is through and from what Slade could see Dick was at least close enough on both counts that Jason agrees to try.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 138,176Chapters: 28/42Kudos: 1,086

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: The Inheritance
entry.summary:
Author: HopelesslyObsessed

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,852Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 20

Summary: They had an agreement that for Jason's sake, she'd keep her distance. But when he dies a few weeks short of his sixteenth birthday, it becomes her biggest regret. So, what if he'd had a crush on her? If only she'd been there, maybe things wouldn't have ended so tragically.She shouldn't have ever set foot in Gotham again, but Bruce was going down a dark path, and they both needed Joker to pay for what he did. The clown remains elusive, and she can't deny that Bruce's violence is rubbing off on her. When they finally catch him, things don't end well for any of them, and she's driven further than Bludhaven in search of herself.It starts as a cover, a cathartic act to help her work through her emotions, but her pain runs deeper, and the only relief she finds is in another young mercenary, who has almost as much as her to hide, and a similar taste in red.

entry.summary:
Author: ElentiyaG

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,425Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 436

Summary: Dick Grayson was completely blindsided. Since when was Tim Drake, his baby bird, an adult? Since when was baby bird an attractive adult? Isn’t he still like 12 years old and knocking on his door in Bludhaven?
